Name: Forgepaws
Description: Hailing from the bustling foundries of the WebtrES club, Forgepaws is a robust and resilient soldier with a love for metallurgy and a flair for feline finesse. Equipped with arms and legs crafted from the finest alloys, Forgepaws can handle the heat of any battle or blacksmithing project. The cat-themed buttons and screen interface reveal a soft spot for whiskered companions, while the sleek shades add an air of mystery. Whether hammering out armor plates or strategizing in the war room, Forgepaws is the go-to member for a sturdy build and a purr-fect plan.
